requirement.topic: If the receiver of a PtP message is offline or has no callback, the sender gets an exception
requirement.description: If you send a message to a named destination, using the qos <destination> tag, and there is no callback for this receiver, or the receiver is not logged in and the <ForceQueuing> qos tag is not set in this message, you get a XmlBlasterException.
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
